HOW TO IMPROVE YOUR SLEEP QUALITY

1. Maintain a consistent sleep schedule, even on weekends
2. Create a relaxing bedtime routine - try reading or light stretching
3. Keep your bedroom cool, dark, and quiet
4. Avoid screens for at least one hour before bed
5. Limit caffeine after 2 PM
6. Exercise regularly, but not within 3 hours of bedtime

Following these tips can significantly improve your sleep quality and overall energy levels.
